Outside of these occasional discounts, which we usually see during specific holiday seasons and Prime Day events, you’d have to pay $550 for this handy multi-styler at full price. Over the year, we’ve only seen five discounts, with today’s rate only beaten out by a one-time fall to $375 back in July. While that rate is not coming back right now, you can score it at the next-best price, courtesy of this $150 markdown – and it’s here just in time for your holiday shopping needs!

As part of its Target’s Black Friday Deals of the Day, you can pick up the Dyson’s Red V8 Origin Cordless Stick Vacuum at $279.99 shipped with a Target Circle account (FREE to sign up here), which you won’t find at Amazon outside of a refurbished option that is currently priced $29 higher. Without this short-term deal, you’d be paying $440 for it at full price, with the discounts we have seen this year being few and far between, going as low as $300. While we did see it go $10 lower during last year’s Black Friday season with a Sam’s Club membership, you’re getting the next-best rate here for a few hours longer, cutting $160 off the going rate.
